text.intro:
*Hey, I'm Akinator!* ğŸ§

Just think of any character, object or animal, and i will try to guess it! Type _'play'_ to start you game on the go!

*How to Play?* ğŸ¯

1ï¸âƒ£ Think of any Animal/Character/Object
2ï¸âƒ£ Type ```play```. if you are playing in a group, type ```aki play``` 
3ï¸âƒ£ You will get three options [Animal/Character/Object], choose accordingly
4ï¸âƒ£ You will get a series of questions, You can answer by choosing from the given options: Yes, No, Don't Know, Probably, Probably not
5ï¸âƒ£ After 10-20 questions, I will guess the thing you are guessing
6ï¸âƒ£ Mostly I get it correct, but not sure tho!

*Extra Stuff* ğŸ“¦

1ï¸âƒ£ If you want to stop the game, type ```stop``` or ```end```. Then guess how you would stop me in groups!

_This bot made by ğ–ğ–†ğ–—ğ–—ğ–!_
text.end: Woo! You ended your game! You can start a  new game by typing _'play'_ / _'start'_
text.exist: You already have a game going on! type _'stop'_ to end the existing game. Then you can start a new one!.
text.not_your: This question is not for you! Type ```aki start``` to start new game for you!
text.timeout: ğŸ—‘ï¸ Your game was deleted due to inactivity. Type ```'start'``` to play again!
